participant_1.name: Liam Cohen
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and determined, Liam enjoys taking risks, which is reflected in his work as a stunt double. He is also caring and empathetic, often seeking to connect with others.
participant_1.background: i was raised in a single parent household. i only eat kosher. i am a stunt double as my second job. i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life.

participant_2.name: Sophie Johnson
participant_2.personality: Driven and sociable, Sophie thrives in social settings and enjoys helping others. She possesses a strong sense of ambition and responsibility, seeking to make a positive impact in her career.
participant_2.background: i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. my parents are very wealthy bankers. i grew up in manhattan. i plan to go to business school next year. i drive a bmw.

content.text: i do not have any , but i do have a lot of friends .
yes , i have a lot of friends .
yes , i do . i have a lot of friends .
yes i do . i love to help people .
